title: The Rice Bag Hammock
description: The Rice Bag Hammock is a book that takes its readers on the journey of an ordinary burlap bag. It makes its way from holding freshly harvested rice to becoming the center of playground, family life, community and everyday activities.Told in a lyrical voice and filled with vibrant detailed illustrations of scenic Guyanese countryside, The Rice Bag Hammock is a picture book for all ages.
author: Shaeeza Haniff
